title:
Jug
Jug
description: Cylindrical uncovered pot. Tinned interior. Incurved lower section with flat base. Three engraved concentric lines at lip. Curved sheet metal spout attached with five rivets. Applied strap handle engraved with con- centric lines and stamped with a triangle.
